<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/v1/companies/search"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Search companies by name or ticker symbol.

Designed for typeahead search as users type in a search field. Returns a list of matching companies
with their names, ticker symbols, exchange, and CIK.

- **query**: Text to search for in company names or tickers (case-insensitive partial match)
- **includeDelisted**: Whether to include delisted companies in search results
- **limit**: Maximum number of results to return (defaults to 10)

*Note: All JSON fields use camelCase naming convention.*

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>
